trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSHWDTERRITORY_00639_AUGEBERT_000_000<tab>Well, if it ain't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You couldn't have come at a better time, my friend.

TEXT_CTSHWDTERRITORY_00639_AUGEBERT_000_010<tab>As you can see, we're havin' ourselves a bit of fun at the moment. To celebrate the completion of works, the residents and artisans decided to get together and host a festival.

TEXT_CTSHWDTERRITORY_00639_AUGEBERT_000_020<tab>The Skyrise Celebration, it's called, and it's got somethin' for everyone. If you're not otherwise occupied, I reckon you'd enjoy takin' part in some fêtes. They're held regularly and offer some fine rewards.

TEXT_CTSHWDTERRITORY_00639_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>During the Skyrise Celebration, various diverting games known as fêtes are held at regular intervals and in succession. Information on when the next fêtes will take place can be viewed while in the Firmament.
TEXT_CTSHWDTERRITORY_00639_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>In order to participate and earn rewards, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land.
